nested_items.name: EndpointAccessList
nested_items.description: The list of endpoints with access to the cluster.

nested_items.name: ClusterIdentifier
nested_items.description: The cluster identifier of the cluster associated with the endpoint.

nested_items.name: ResourceOwner
nested_items.description: The Amazon Web Services account ID of the owner of the cluster.

nested_items.name: SubnetGroupName
nested_items.description: The subnet group name where Amazon Redshift chooses to deploy the endpoint.

nested_items.name: EndpointStatus
nested_items.description: The status of the endpoint.

nested_items.name: EndpointName
nested_items.description: The name of the endpoint.

nested_items.name: EndpointCreateTime
nested_items.description: The time (UTC) that the endpoint was created.

nested_items.name: Port
nested_items.description: The port number on which the cluster accepts incoming connections.

nested_items.name: Address
nested_items.description: The DNS address of the endpoint.

nested_items.name: VpcSecurityGroups
nested_items.description: The security groups associated with the endpoint.

nested_items.name: VpcSecurityGroupId
nested_items.description: The identifier of the VPC security group.

nested_items.name: Status
nested_items.description: The status of the VPC security group.

nested_items.name: VpcEndpoint
nested_items.description: The connection endpoint for connecting to an Amazon Redshift cluster through the proxy.

nested_items.name: VpcEndpointId
nested_items.description: The connection endpoint ID for connecting an Amazon Redshift cluster through the proxy.

nested_items.name: VpcId
nested_items.description: The VPC identifier that the endpoint is associated.

nested_items.name: NetworkInterfaces
nested_items.description: One or more network interfaces of the endpoint. Also known as an interface endpoint.

nested_items.name: NetworkInterfaceId
nested_items.description: The network interface identifier.

nested_items.name: SubnetId
nested_items.description: The subnet identifier.

nested_items.name: PrivateIpAddress
nested_items.description: The IPv4 address of the network interface within the subnet.

nested_items.name: AvailabilityZone
nested_items.description: The Availability Zone.

nested_items.name: Ipv6Address
nested_items.description: The IPv6 address of the network interface within the subnet.

nested_items.name: Marker
nested_items.description: An optional pagination token provided by a previous DescribeEndpointAccess request. If this parameter is specified, the response includes only records beyond the marker, up to the value specified by the MaxRecords parameter.
